name: Sheriff Rick's Shootout (Post Jam Edition)
description:
--- Mild Strobe Warning ---

Blast through cans, bottles and cutouts of bandits and animals in five rounds of exciting shooting gallery action! Aim for the head for extra points. And don't worry, the targets are all fake!

This version patches lots of glitches, adds pitch modulation to the sound effects, and also enhances some of the visuals.

---Credits---

Made by Chris Duong,  Kham-Shem Toure,  Kevin Fischer,  Kyle Cambell, and Miles Dievendorf.

---Sound---

"Redneck rolls dice" by Mike Koenig. Acquired from soundbible.com and used under an Attribution 3.0 license. Remixed by Kevin Fischer.

"44 Magnum" by Mike Koenig. Acquired from soundbible.com and used under an Attribution 3.0 license. Unaltered.

"Fisher Cat" by macindoe1. Acquired from soundbible.com and used under a Sampling Plus 1.0 license. Unaltered.

"Gun Fire" by GoodSoundsForYou. Acquired from soundbible.com and used under an Attribution 3.0 license. Unaltered.

"Hawk Screech Valley" by Mike Koenig. Acquired from soundbible.com and used under an Attribution 3.0 license. Unaltered.

"Pig Oink" by Mike Koenig. Acquired from soundbible.com and used under an Attribution 3.0 license. Unaltered.

"Pain" by thecheeseman. Acquired from soundbible.com and used under a Sampling Plus 1.0 license. Unaltered.

---Music---

"Ragtime Ranger" by Kham-Shem Toure. Created during the jam.

"Marchen Bach Jam Cream" by milky-chu. Acquired from freemusicarchive.org and used under an Attribution 4.0 license. Remixed slightly by Kevin Fischer.

"Heavens to Murgatroyd" by Polyphony Più. Acquired from freemusicarchive.org and used under an Attribution 4.0 license. Unaltered.
